revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Icefall Cave |image = [[File:Icefall Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Icefall Cave. |tokens = 43,000 |location = Sevii Island 4 }} '''Icefall Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=25|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Seel.png|40px]] Seel |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Swinub.png|40px]] Swinub |- | [[File:Delibird.png|40px]] Delibird |- | [[File:Sneasel.png|40px]] Sneasel |- | [[File:Wooper.png|40px]] Wooper |- | [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Poliwag.png|40px]] Poliwag |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl |- | [[File:Tentacool.png|40px]] Tentacool |- | [[File:Tentacruel.png|40px]] Tentacruel |- | [[File:Horsea.png|40px]] Horsea |- | [[File:Krabby.png|40px]] Krabby |- | [[File:Shellder.png|40px]] Shellder |- | [[File:Staryu.png|40px]] Staryu |- | [[File:Seadra.png|40px]] Seadra |- | [[File:Kingler.png|40px]] Kingler |- | [[File:Dewgong.png|40px]] Dewgong |- | [[File:Gyarados.png|40px]] Gyarados |- | [[File:Lapras.png|40px]] Lapras |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | colspan=2 rowspan=3|<center> N/A || rowspan=3 | [[File:Team Rocket Grunt (male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || <center>250,000 |- |}
==Items==
===No Debuff===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.05% || 20.21% |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.05% || 20.21% |- | {{Bag2|Aspear}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.05% || 20.21% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.74% || 3.37% |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.74% || 3.37% |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.74% || 3.37% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.59% || 4.03% |}
===Debuff Drop Table===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | {{Bag2|Aspear}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.30% || 0.30% || 0.30% |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 0.30% || 0.30% || 0.30% |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 0.30% || 0.30% || 0.30% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% |}
